title: President of Portugal - Wikipedia
snippet: The current president of Portugal is Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, who took office on 9 March 2016.

title: List of presidents of Portugal - Wikipedia
snippet: The current president of the Portuguese Republic is Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, the winner of the 2016 presidential election and re-elected in the 2021 presidential election.

title: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa - Wikipedia
snippet: Marcelo Nuno Duarte Rebelo de Sousa ... who has been the president of Portugal since 2016. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party, though he suspended his party membership for the duration of his presidency.
